changeSet.author: Dogukan Sahinturk
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CRM_QUOTE SET SERVICE_AREA = 'DTR' WHERE SERVICE_AREA = 'DOMESTIC';
UPDATE CRM_QUOTE SET SERVICE_AREA = 'CUSTOMS' WHERE SERVICE_AREA = 'CCL';
UPDATE CRM_PRODUCT SET SERVICE_AREA = 'DTR' WHERE SERVICE_AREA = 'DOMESTIC';
UPDATE CRM_PRODUCT SET SERVICE_AREA = 'CUSTOMS' WHERE SERVICE_AREA = 'CCL';

changeSet.author: Dogukan Sahinturk
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CRM_PRICE SET BILLING_ITEM = 'DTR_FREIGHT' WHERE BILLING_ITEM='DOMESTIC_FREIGHT'

changeSet.author: Dogukan Sahinturk
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CRM_QUOTE SET SERVICE_AREA = 'CCL' WHERE SERVICE_AREA = 'CUSTOMS';
UPDATE CRM_PRODUCT SET SERVICE_AREA = 'CCL' WHERE SERVICE_AREA = 'CUSTOMS';

changeSet.sql: UPDATE CRM_QUOTE Q SET Q.HOLDING_FOR_COMPANY_TRANSFER = (SELECT S.HOLDING_FOR_COMPANY_TRANSFER FROM CRM_SPOT_QUOTE S WHERE Q.ID=S.QUOTE_ID );

changeSet.author: Dogukan Sahinturk
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CRM_QUOTE SET OPPORTUNITY_ID = NULL

changeSet.author: AliRiza.Bostanci
changeSet.sql: update crm_spot_quote q set q.ldm_coefficient = 1750, q.volume_coefficient = 250 where q.quote_id in (select distinct quote_id from crm_service s where s.type <> 'SPEEDY' and s.type <> 'SPEEDY_VAN' and deleted = 0);

update crm_spot_quote q set q.ldm_coefficient = 700, q.volume_coefficient = 150 where q.quote_id in (select distinct quote_id from crm_service s where (s.type = 'SPEEDY' or s.type = 'SPEEDY_VAN') and deleted = 0);
